songs.title: Bentley
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
[?]

[Chorus]
Back in the spot, back in the Bentley (Yo)
Fuckin' that bitch, Bentley (Yo Pierre, you wanna come out here?)
Back in the lot, back in the Bentley
I'm fuckin' yo bitch, fuck what it dealin'

[Verse 1]
Fuck that bitch in the back of the lot, fuck that bitch in the Bentley
Fuck that bitch in the back of the spot, fuck that bitch in my Bentley
Smack that hoe in the back of the lot, fuck that hoe in my Bentley
Smack that hoe in the back of the lot, smack that hoe in my Bentley
All of my niggas, they winnin'
All of you boys on benches
All of your bitches, they silly
All of my bitches, they ten
[?]
Smack that hoe in the back of the lot, smack that hoe in my Bentley
[?]
God knows where we did it
All of that shit, we did it
Talkin' that shit, we winnin', uh
Yeah, it been a minute
.45 with the choppa
Yeah, I let it hit it
.45 with the fuckin' choppa
Yeah, it been a minute
I just fucked this [?] bitch
[?]
[?]
Like, shoutout to my Bentley
Shawty wanna float with Cash Carti, got the boat
Shawty wanna get the bag like she Beetho-
Allergy, lame nigga, allergy
Bad bitch, all on me
Shawty wanna fuck me for my melody
[?], 29
Bad bitch, number five
Ball like Jordan, [?]
Stay in line, [?]
Give me a minute, fuckin' these bitches
Yeah they twinnin', damn, I'm winnin'
I'm in line, yeah, my britches
Playboy bunny, I got Bentley
Fuck that bitch in the back of the lot, fuck that bitch in the Bentley
Fuck that bitch in the back of the spot, fuck that bitch in my Bentley
All these niggas, they sound like cops, all these niggas they silly

[Chorus]
One time
Back in the spot, back in the Bentley (Yo)
Fuckin' that bitch, Bentley (Yo Pierre, you wanna come out here?)
Back in the lot, back in the Bentley
I'm fuckin' yo bitch, fuck what it dealin'

[Verse 2]
All of my lean, it dirty
All of my lean, it dirty
All of you niggas, they dirty
All of my niggas, they dirty
All of my niggas, they swervin'
Hellcat with the curve
All of my niggas, they swervin'
Hellcat with the curve
I was on the block, feelin' like 2Pac
And I got two Glocks, ridin' with a lot
Fell in love, with a lotta hoes
That's my bigger issue, that's a [?]
A lotta niggas friends, then they turn to foes
I got lotta bags, never [?]
Nigga gettin' fold, when that story told
Shawty wanna bag, shawty wanna roll
Fuck that lil' bih in the city
Fuck that lil' bih in my Bentley
Fuck that lil' bih with my Bentley
All of my niggas, they winnin'
All of my bitches, they twinnin'
All of my niggas, they gettin'
All of my niggas, they winnin'
Your niggas, they sittin' on benches
Young nigga, they gettin' a niggas
Your niggas, they lookin' like snitches
It's 2900, lil' nigga
It's 2900

[Interlude]
Ayy, it's 2900, lil' nigga
Fuck that lil' bitch in the back
Fuck that lil' bitch in the whip
Fuck that lil' bitch with the gat
[?]
Fuck that lil' bitch with the thing
Pop in that bitch with a Tec
Fuck that lil' bitch with the swag
Fuck that lil' bitch with the-

[Chorus]
Back in the spot, back in the Bentley
Fuckin' that bitch, Bentley
Back in the lot, back in the Bentley
I'm fuckin' yo bitch, fuck what it dealin'
